feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two envelope‑related UI modification requirements and their associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including App, envelope scene, message card, global styles, Tailwind config, and HTML entry.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility imports plus OKLCH color variables and dark‑mode theming for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with meta tags and Google Fonts setup referencing Inter and Playfair Display.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that renders the envelope scene and a styled footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/ValentineEnvelop: Interactive envelope scene managing animations, floating hearts, sparkles, and transitions between envelope, card, and message states.
frontend/src/components/ValentineMessage: Full‑screen message card with typing animation, confetti, and navigation back to the card or envelope.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity changes using react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider wrapping DFINITY AuthClient for login, identity storage, and status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, and custom Valentine-themed animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins using CSS variable–driven theming.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, requirements, features, and known issues for the Valentine’s Day card website.
